scripts.compile: [ -e node_modules/scrypt/build/Release/scrypt.node ] || docker run --rm -v /etc/passwd:/etc/passwd -u `id -u`:`id -g` -v $HOME:$HOME -w $PWD lambci/lambda:build-nodejs6.10 npm install scrypt
scripts.native: docker run --rm -v /etc/passwd:/etc/passwd -u `id -u`:`id -g` -v $HOME:$HOME -w $PWD/native lambci/lambda:build-nodejs6.10 npm install scrypt --prefix .
